title: Delphine
description: "True love. I have seen it. Now, I want to feel it."Delphine Delmar, the seventeen-year-old Princess of Isola di Squalo, fell in love with love watching her sister, Queen Terra, and her brother, Prince Fedder, get swept away and find their own “happily ever afters.” Now, she longs to find a true love of her own.She makes the brave and fateful decision to leave her home to find her heart's desire. She travels across the world to Canada where she hides her true identity from everyone, even making her bodyguard, Matteo, enroll in art classes at the institute she now attends. She makes a lifelong friend in her quirky roommate, Piper, who becomes one of her strongest supporters in her quest for true love. And she lays her heart on the line hoping for a fairy tale ending.On the journey, she finds joy, frustration, heart-break, confusion and elation, but she can never escape her promise to the people of her home island. The sharks search her out across the globe, and now, it's a race against time to extinguish an invisible threat. Will Delphine have to return home before she has found what she is looking for?Enjoy the romance and mystery in the second installment of the Delmar Shark Chronicles.
author: Heidi Peltier
